Package: com.android.build.gradle.internal.dsl

[Groovy] Class ProductFlavor

            • @com.android.annotations.NonNull void proguardFile(Object proguardFile)

              Adds a new ProGuard configuration file.

              proguardFile getDefaultProguardFile('proguard-android.txt')

              There are 2 default rules files

              • proguard-android.txt
              • proguard-android-optimize.txt

              They are located in the SDK. Using getDefaultProguardFile(String filename) will return the full path to the files. They are identical except for enabling optimizations.

            • @com.android.annotations.NonNull void proguardFiles(Object... proguardFileArray)
